LOL OWNT, gd someone agrees wid me[br][size=1]Posted on: August 04, 2007, 10:32:22 PM[/size][hr][quote=“wales 00, post:1, topic:130237”][quote author=I Am Noob link=topic=180893.msg1652092#msg1652092 date=1186255810]

l2portfoward - host yourself

that way no-one can nick your source cof pile o’crap cof

i would and i have
but it wont work!
its annoying

look in tut section DUH ??? tbh some people are useless on thease forums
[/quote]
dude i know how to port forward…
ive opend port 43594
and ive portforwarded for other games before
but when i try and portforward this one it wont work for me
thats why i need a hoster[/quote]

[sarcasm]We believe u [/sarcasm], if u can port foward for one game you can do it for p servers DERRRRR
